Public Sub Filter (dateRange As DateRangeType, rangeElements As String, inputSeriesNames As String)
public: void Filter(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateRangeType dateRange, System::String ^ rangeElements, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);

param.name: dateRange
param.span: 列舉值，表示日期/時間間隔 (例如一週的日期或月份的日期等等)。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents a date/time interval, such as days of the week, days of the month, and so forth.

param.span: 判斷指定之項目的篩選範圍。

span.span: Determines the range over which the given elements will be filtered.

param.name: rangeElements
param.span: 指定 dateRange 參數所指定之日期/時間範圍內的元素，此參數將會先經過篩選。

span.span: Specifies the elements within the date/time range designated by the dateRange parameter that will be filtered.

param.span: 可以是單一值 (例如 "7")、逗號分隔值 (例如 "5,6")、範圍值 (例如 "9-11") 或包含這三者的變化組合 (例如 "5,6,9-11")。

span.span: Can be a single value, for example, "7"; comma-separated values, for example, "5,6"; a range of values, such as "9-11"; or any variation thereof, such as "5,6,9-11".

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: 要篩選之以逗號分隔的 名稱清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of names of the to be filtered.

summary.span: 篩選一個或多個數列中的資料點，方法可以透過移除指定的資料點或將這些資料點標記為指定之日期/時間範圍的空資料點。

span.span: Filters the data points of one or more series, either by removing the specified points or by marking them as empty for the given date/time ranges.

summary.span: 已篩選的 物件會用於儲存修改的資料。

span.span: The filtered objects are used to store the modified data.

public: void Sort(System::Collections::Generic::IComparer<System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPoint ^> ^ comparer, System::String ^ seriesName);

param.name: comparer
param.span: 可實作 介面並提供自訂排序邏輯的物件。

span.span: An object that implements the interface and provides the custom sorting logic.

param.name: seriesName
param.span: 要排序之以逗號分隔的 名稱清單。

summary.span: 對一個或多個數列中的資料點執行自訂排序。

span.span: Performs a custom sort on the data points in one or more series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會在一或多個數列; 中的資料點上執行自訂排序來定義排序邏輯`comparer`參數。This method performs a custom sort on the data points in one or more series; the sort logic is defined by the `comparer` parameter. 覆寫並實作方法介面執行 comparison(s)，然後傳回`true`或`false`。Override and implement the method of the interface, perform the comparison(s) and then return `true` or `false`. 排序順序取決於傳回的值。The sort order is determined by the return value. 請注意，是否排序多個數列，數列必須對齊，否則會擲回例外狀況。Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 兩個物件的參數方法的類型必須一律是。The two object parameters of the method must always be of type . > [!IMPORTANT] > 所有資料點，不論它們所屬的數列會根據第一個數列; 都排序如果第一個數列中資料點的位置變更，以及變更其他數列中所有對應的點。All data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series; if the position of a data point in the first series changes, all corresponding points in the other series change as well.

public: void Sort(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::PointSortOrder pointSortOrder, System::String ^ sortBy, System::String ^ seriesName);

param.name: pointSortOrder
param.span: 列舉值，決定要遞增排序還是遞減排序。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines if the sort is ascending or descending.

param.name: sortBy
param.span: 值，表示要排序的資料點值。

span.span: A value that represents the data point values to be sorted.

param.span: 可能的值為："X"、"Y"、"Y2"、"Y3" 和 "AxisLabel" 等等。

span.span: Possible values are: "X", "Y", "Y2", "Y3", "AxisLabel", and so forth.

param.name: seriesName
param.span: 要排序之以逗號分隔的 名稱清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of names of the to be sorted.

summary.span: 使用指定的順序，在一個或多個數列的資料點上執行排序。

span.span: Performs a sort on the data points in one or more series, using the specified order.

summary.span: 您可以根據任何可用的資料點值來排序。

span.span: The sort can be based on any available data point value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行遞增或遞減排序的資料點在一系列，並設定中的值根據`sortBy`參數，例如"X"、"AxisLabel"、"Y"、"Y1"等等。This method performs an ascending or descending sort on data points in a series, and is based on the value that is set in the `sortBy` parameter such as "X", "AxisLabel", "Y", "Y1", and so forth. 請注意，是否排序多個數列，數列必須對齊，否則會擲回例外狀況。Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用指定會排序所有數列 Y 值，從第一個列出的序列;也就是說，所有資料點，不論它們所屬的數列會根據第一個數列都排序。All series will be sorted using the specified Y-value from the FIRST listed series; that is, all data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series. 若要排序點使用的自訂排序常式，請使用不同的定義，這個多載的方法。To sort points using a custom sort routine, use a different definition of this overloaded method.
